name: Youth Programs
description: Most of of their services will be available by phone. Please call the main line for information about specific programs. As part of MYEEP, the Mayor’s Youth Employment and Education Program, youth ages 14-17 receive job readiness training, employment opportunities, academic support, and personal development. 100% of program participants work at 30 different non-profit, public sector and private sector worksites throughout the city to receive work experience and be ready for their future job. Eve
